ITEM.NAME: STANDALONE
ITEM.NOT_SHOW_IF: ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE')) AND (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM')

PARAMETER.NAME: HIVE_SERVER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') OR (DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR213') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR301') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR310') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR401') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR410') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='EMR_4_0_0'))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KRB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR (((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: JOBTRACKER_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR (DISTRIBUTION != 'CUSTOM' AND ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4' OR HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2')))))

PARAMETER.NAME: RESOURCEMANAGER_PRINCIPAL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR ((((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1')) OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_KEYTAB
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (isShow[USE_KRB]) AND USE_KRB=='true' AND ((CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR (CONNECTION_MODE=='STANDALONE' AND HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2'))

PARAMETER.NAME: USE_SSL
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2') AND ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM') OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='EMR_4_0_0') OR (((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_MAPRED_JT
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: DISTRIBUTION!='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT' AND (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='false') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' AND HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR' AND HIVE_VERSION!='EMR_4_0_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR_0_13_1' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_2_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_2_1' AND HIVE_VERSION!='HDP_2_2' AND ((DISTRIBUTION!='CLOUDERA') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH4') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1')) AND ((HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR401') OR (HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR410'))

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_RESOURCE_MANAGER
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR' OR HIVE_VERSION=='EMR_4_0_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR_0_13_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1')) OR ((HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR401') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR410'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: EXECUTION_ENGINE
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: (CONNECTION_MODE == 'EMBEDDED') AND ((DISTRIBUTION == 'CUSTOM') OR ((DISTRIBUTION == 'HORTONWORKS') AND ((HIVE_VERSION == 'HDP_2_1') OR (HIVE_VERSION == 'HDP_2_2'))) OR ((DISTRIBUTION == 'MAPR') AND ((HIVE_VERSION == 'MAPR401') OR (HIVE_VERSION == 'MAPR410'))))

PARAMETER.NAME: REGISTER_JAR_NOTE
PARAMETER.DEFAULT: When filling in the Jar path information below, make sure that the JAR files are available on the server.

PARAMETER.NAME: SET_MEMORY
PARAMETER.SHOW_IF: ((DISTRIBUTION=='CUSTOM' AND USE_YARN=='true') OR (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND (HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1' OR HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2' OR HIVE_VERSION=='EMR_4_0_0' OR ((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4') AND (HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH5_1_MR1')) OR HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR401' OR HIVE_VERSION=='MAPR410' OR DISTRIBUTION=='MICROSOFT_HD_INSIGHT')))

IMPORT.NAME: hadoop-conf-kerberos
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM') AND (USE_KRB=='true') AND ((HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_2') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_1_3') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_0') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_1') OR (HIVE_VERSION=='HDP_2_2') OR (((DISTRIBUTION=='CLOUDERA') OR HIVE_VERSION=='PIVOTAL_HD_2_0' OR HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR' OR HIVE_VERSION=='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR_0_13_1') AND ((HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE' AND CONNECTION_MODE=='EMBEDDED') OR HIVE_SERVER=='HIVE2')))

IMPORT.NAME: parquet-hive-bundle-1.5.0
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (DISTRIBUTION!='PIVOTAL_HD' AND DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4' AND HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR2' AND HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_1_0_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR_0_13_1')

IMPORT.NAME: snappy-java-1.0.5.jar
IMPORT.REQUIRED_IF: (DISTRIBUTION!='CUSTOM' AND HIVE_VERSION!='Cloudera_CDH4' AND HIVE_VERSION!='MAPR2' AND HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_1_0_0' AND HIVE_VERSION!='PIVOTAL_HD_1_0_1' AND HIVE_VERSION!='APACHE_2_4_0_EMR_0_13_1')
